titles.title: Foreign Agent and Interest Reporting Act

A bill to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to require lobbyists who represent foreign nationals to report to the Federal Election Commission contributions made to Federal election campaigns and other political committees.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S12620)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 8/25/1994--Introduced. Foreign Agent and Interest Reporting Act - Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to require lobbyists who represent foreign nationals to report to the Federal Election Commission contributions made to Federal election campaigns and other political committees.
